translation.en: How do I look?
Good? Cool? [sniffles]
-[clears throat] -[producer] Whenever you're ready.
Electronica isn't just music for me.

And this is his story.
But mostly...

[announcer] Brisbane, give it up for DJ Fingablast

I had mo' money and fewer problems, yo.

-[mellow music playing] -That smokestack right there is my girl,

I knew I had to lock that ish down.

She's gonna love this. Shh.

translation.en: so I let my music speak for me.
So what do you say, babe?
Will you marry me?
No homo?
M'kay.
Yes!
Yes!
Boom!

"When Let The Dogs Out?"

translation.en: -[young Fingablast] Bart Simpson's a girl? -Yeah, he is.
[young Fingablast] Well, you were awesome.
And when I grow up, I want to be like you.

don't do drugs... on an army base.

translation.en: The answer was obvious:
DJ Slizzard.
Little did I know...
I didn't know what I was in for.
-[geese honking] -[moody string music playing]

Hey, guys! DJ Slizzard is north Indiana's only DJ for all your party needs,

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] So I flew to Indiana
and set up a camera at the airport.
Then I flew back to New York and got on another plane to Indiana

translation.en: Here we go. This looks like it's it.
[man] Hey, hey, hey!
You boys on private property!
You better watch it! I know some karate videos I can throw at you.

Who? Dick Wayne?

Do you know when Maestro Wayne'll be back?

translation.en: even if some of his relatives come around looking for them.
DJ Slizzard is dead?
[Bankston] He's in prison.
Forever. Ever. Ever.
Ever.
[coughs] I'm sorry. Forgot to take my medication this morning.

translation.en: Orning. Orning.
Orning.
[DJ Fingablast] DJ Sliz, in priz?
It didn't make any sense.
I mean, DJ Slizzard is the legend who brought the air horn to the Midwest.

Get it up, get it up, get it up!

translation.en: -[producer] What do you think he did? -[clicks tongue]
There's only one thing I can think of.

Beats that sick gotta be illegal.

translation.en: You're under arrest.
It's the only explanation.
And yet, it also wasn't.
Well, the little stinker in tonight's Naughty Neighbors Nook
is Richard Wayne Gary Wayne.
The Durnsville resident and adjunct professor at Trump University

translation.ko: 월마트에서 수상한 행동을 보여 오늘 체포됐습니다

translation.en: I need these tampons because I am a woman,
translation.ko: "8번 복도 1번 카메라" 난 탐폰 사야 해, 난 여자고 자신 있게 수영 하고 싶으니까

Karate! Karate! Regular punch!

So? Girls are keys.
Everyone knows that.
'Cause they love rings, and they'll poke you in the scrotum

translation.ko: "풀려난 여성들 케샤가 누군지 모름" - 함께 오래 있다 보니 - 함께 오래 있다 보니

Library. Melissa Joan Hart.

Ah, the "Macarena." Wonderful.

translation.en: -Remember when Dr. Evil did it? -Ay!

I'll just be in the bunker.

I asked for a mirror, not a picture of an old Irish witch.

but you didn't know what was happening?
Well, it's healthy

translation.en: to have secrets in a relationship.

translation.en: He doesn't know about half the yarn I buy.

translation.en: You were his fudging girlfriend?
Well, it's hard to find a tall guy.
translation.ko: 키 큰 남자를 찾는 건 어렵다고요

translation.en: [reporter] Richard Wayne Gary Wayne was sentenced today
translation.ko: "배심원단, 변태 교주로 얼버무리 무침" 오늘 리처드 웨인 게리 웨인의 납치죄 형량 선고가 있었습니다

translation.en: to three counts of white kidnapping

translation.en: and one count of "oopsie, no bueno."
[DJ Fingablast] How could someone who created so much beauty

translation.en: be responsible for such butt ugliness?

translation.en: And also, was I skipping stones wrong?
To answer that question, I consulted champion stone skipper

translation.en: Damar Varnish at his estate, Rockswater.

translation.en: No.
You've gotta...
side-arm it.
Like that.
[DJ Fingablast] My other questions,
-only one man could... -[line rings]
...should, and would answer them.

Uh, hello, sir. This is Douglas Fingerbur--
DJ Fingablast.
I wanna talk to you about why you're in prison.
translation.ko: 선생님이 수감된 이유를 만나서 듣고 싶어요

translation.en: [Richard] Hang on, this is a dude?
'Cause this whole prison deal is kind of a sausage fest.
Anyone who visits better be ready to put something I don't have on the glass.
translation.ko: 내 면회객은 내게 없는 걸 차단 창으로 보여줘야 해

translation.en: Boobs, butt--
Wait, you don't have a butt?
[DJ Fingablast] My hero doesn't have a butt...
but I do.
And if I'm ever gonna meet him...
I gotta catfish DJ Slizzard.
So I made a fake Facebook profile

translation.en: that was sure to get his attention.
translation.ko: 슬리저드의 관심을 100% 끌 가짜 페이스북 프로필을 만들었다 "캐런 소렌토"

translation.en: This is all for us, babe.
translation.ko: "디제이 트럼프 미국 부흥" 다 우릴 위한 거야

translation.en: [Hello] I'm cold.
[DJ Fingablast] But then I learned something from a rerun of CSI: Miami
translation.ko: 그러다 'CSI 마이애미' 재방송을 통해 배운 게 있다

translation.en: that I was unable to get the rights to.
He won't be liking any more pictures of corpses on Facebook.
translation.ko: 페이스북에 시신 사진을 올려도 그자는 안 좋아할 거야

translation.en: Because prisoners aren't allowed to use Facebook.
[DJ Fingablast] I printed Karen's page and mailed it to DJ Slizzard.
translation.ko: 그래서 캐런의 페이지를 인쇄해 슬리저드에게 우편으로 보냈다

that I rubbed on a small dog.
[DJ Fingablast] Let's do this.
DJ Slizzard, here we come.
Well, well, well, Miss Sorrento.
Me likey.
Now, uh... why don't you put something on the glass?
Chef's choice. Omakase!
You need to put something on the glass for me first:
answers.
Oh, man. Another catfish?
Shoot.
[DJ Fingablast] I worshipped you, man.
How could you do something so sick?

translation.en: And not good sick, like sneakers you wait in line for.

translation.en: What's going on with the camera?
Oh, I'm making a documentary.
-About me? -No, it's about me

translation.en: needing a DJ for my wedding.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 제 결혼식 DJ를 찾는 여정에 대해서요

translation.en: [Richard] Stupid. Why would anybody wanna make a... a movie about ole Dicky Slizzard, right?
translation.ko: 한물간 디키 슬리저드에 관해 누가 다큐를 찍고 싶겠어?

translation.en: Only thing I've ever been good at is manipulating people.
translation.ko: 내가 살면서 잘한 거라곤 사람들 속인 건데

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] Hey, don't say that. You were also a great DJ.
Yeah, I were.
I mean, it's hopeless for me.
For somebody to get my case reopened,
they'd have to be really smart,
have to have some money,
bunch of cameras.
They'd have to have a... a visitor's pass to this prison.
I mean... [scoffs] Good luck, Dick!
I'm out of here, man.
-Sliz, wait. -What?
Could I really get your case reopened?
translation.ko: 저 때문에 재수사가 될 수도 있나요?

translation.en: Like, is that a real thing?
Adnan from Serial,
Staircase guy,
Dr. Richard Kimble...
they all had their cases reopened because of a supersmart documentary
translation.ko: 전부 다 엄청 똑똑한 다큐로 사건이 재수사됐어

translation.en: that didn't leave anything out.
[DJ Fingablast] And that's when, all on my own,
I came up with a new idea for what my documentary should be about.
translation.ko: 내 다큐 주제에 대한 새 아이디어를 생각해냈다

translation.en: So I started looking into it.
And this whole thing... didn't make any sense.
[Richard] I mean, have you even seen these "Mole Women"?
There is a reason that they're named after the least attractive insectivore.
translation.ko: 가장 섹시하지 않은 식충 동물 이름이 붙은 데엔 다 이유가 있어

translation.en: To quote my personal hero and, oh, I don't know, the President...
translation.ko: 내 영웅의 말을 인용해보지 바로 대통령...

translation.en: [Donald Trump] Take a look. Look at her. You tell me what you think.
translation.ko: 그 여자를 직접 보고 어떤 생각이 드는지 말해봐요

translation.en: I don't think so. I don't think so.
Believe me, she would not be my first choice. That, I can tell you.
translation.ko: 진짜로 저라면 그 여자를 처음으로 택하진 않을 겁니다

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] Look, DJ Slizzard is hot--
translation.ko: 디제이 슬리저드는 섹시하다 가장 섹시한 식충 동물처럼

translation.en: as hot as the hottest insectivore.
translation.ko: 디제이 슬리저드는 섹시하다 가장 섹시한 식충 동물처럼 "슬리저드, 개미핥기"

translation.en: Did the Mole Women match up?
translation.ko: "공인된 섹시미" 두더지 여인들이 그 정도 수준일까?

translation.en: It was horrible. [sobs]
And I missed, like, ten Olympics.
translation.ko: 전 올림픽을 열 번쯤 못 봤다고요!

translation.en: It was only nine, Miss Schmidt.
[Dunleavy] Now are you ready to be honest with us?
Hi, Donna Maria Nuñez?
I'm DJ Fingablast. I'm making a documentary.
translation.ko: 전 디제이 핑가블래스트인데 다큐를 만들고 있어요

translation.en: -How old are you? -[Donna Maria] Huh?
Show us the birth cert!
[in Spanish] I didn't know that the monkeys who work in my factories
-were underage. -No, how old are you?
[rapidly] BunCo Bunkers' five-year warranty is void
translation.ko: 뻥코 벙커의 5년 보장은 구매 즉시 무효입니다

translation.en: in the state of purchase. 0% APR financing intended as a joke.
translation.ko: 뻥코 벙커의 5년 보장은 구매 즉시 무효입니다 연복리이자율 0%는 웃기라고 썼으며

translation.en: Product not endorsed by the Peyton Manning who plays football.
translation.ko: 풋볼 선수 페이튼 매닝이 보장 안 하는 상품입니다

translation.en: [Richard] FYI, my fantasy bunker...
translation.ko: "두더지 여인이 슬리저드만큼 매력적인가? 아니요" 참고로 내가 꿈꾸는 벙커 멤버는

translation.en: Copperfield-era Claudia Schiffer,
two Maria Menounoses,
and one of them pomegranate juice bottles.
translation.ko: 그리고 '폼' 석류주스 병 같은 여자 하나지

translation.en: DJ Slizzard, I'm starting to think...
translation.ko: "폼 원더풀" 솔직히 이젠 이런 생각이 들어요

translation.en: -you didn't even do it. -[Richard] Hey, look,
translation.ko: 선생님이 범인이 아닐 수 있다는 이봐, 넌 다큐를 찍고 난 그저 납치나...

translation.en: you're the documentary guy. I'm just a kidnapper. Just a... reverend.
translation.ko: 이봐, 넌 다큐를 찍고 난 그저 납치나... 난 평범한 교주야

translation.en: I-I'm just a...
I'm just an American DJ.
If you didn't do it, who did?
You know what? Why don't you ask yourself this:
who stood to benefit...
from this guy being locked up?
Like Hillary should've been.
Think about it.
I mean, I did have a rival.
DJ Traphouse.
[DJ Fingablast] Another DJ?
As one of our own, I couldn't believe
translation.ko: "디제이 트랩하우스 최고의 디제이" 나도 우리 쪽 사람이지만 우리 쪽 사람이 우리 쪽 사람에게 이런 짓을 하다니

translation.en: that one of our own could do this to one of our own.
translation.ko: 우리 쪽 사람이 우리 쪽 사람에게 이런 짓을 하다니

translation.en: And with you out of the way-- Oh, to him fall the spoils
translation.ko: - 선생님만 없어지면... - 그놈은 내 황금 왕국의

translation.en: of my... Golden... Kingdom:
three p.m. slot at Slappy's Pizza;
signature banter, like, "Wake up, fatties, it's time to boogie";
translation.ko: 내 단골 멘트, '일어나 뚱뚱이, 흔들어, 뒤뚱이'

translation.en: and my antique buffalo-horn and boar-bristle hairbrush collection.
translation.ko: 그리고 골동 물소 뿔이랑 멧돼지 털 머리빗 컬렉션

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] I finally had a lead.
You need to find DJ Traphouse.
[DJ Fingablast] I had to find DJ Traphouse and get him to confess.
Then Slizzard could J my wedding.
translation.ko: 슬리저드는 내 결혼식 디제이를 할 수 있다

translation.en: But no matter how much I drove around,
I couldn't find him or get him to confess.
translation.ko: 도저히 찾을 수도 자백시킬 수도 없었다

translation.en: So I gave up, did ayahuasca in a cemetery,
and it led me straight to Traphouse's current address.
[producer] Hey, he's here.
translation.ko: "동생이자 아들, 아빠는 말고 (속았지?), 디제이" 여기 있네

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] My hero is in jail, and the only person who could free him is dead.
translation.ko: 감옥에 있는 내 영웅을 풀어줄 유일한 사람은 고인이 됐다

translation.en: And I still don't have a wedding DJ.
translation.ko: 난 아직도 결혼식 디제이를 못 구했고

translation.en: So I went back to the only place where I'd ever truly felt safe:
translation.ko: 그래서 내게 진정한 평안을 주는 유일한 곳으로 돌아갔다

translation.en: Rockswater.
-More sideways. -Okay.
That's it.
[DJ Fingablast] Then everything went -from bad... -[cell phone chimes] ...to, "Oh, no, you didn't."
translation.ko: 그러자 가뜩이나 꼬인 상황이 '헐, 장난해?'로 변했다

translation.en: Hey, everyone. I said m'kay.
#pennies.
[operator] Do you accept a collect call from Grundel County Men's Prison?
translation.ko: 그룬델 카운티 남성 교도소에서 온 수신자 부담 전화 받겠습니까?

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] Yes, I do.
[Richard] What do you mean, you're "out"?!
You're leaving me hanging, like my cellmate who couldn't take it.
translation.ko: 더는 못 참았던 감방 동료처럼 날 버리는구나

translation.en: [sighs] Sliz, there's no point.
I don't need a DJ for my wedding anymore.
[Richard] You're like the Drunk History guy.
You got Tiffany Haddish right here, and you're making this about you?!
translation.ko: 티파니 하디시가 있는데 네 얘기만 하는 거야?

translation.en: She dumped me like a poop, bro.
She dumped me like a poop, bruh.
[DJ Fingablast] There was nothing left for me in Indiana,
translation.ko: 이젠 인디애나에서 내가 할 일은 없었기에

translation.en: so I took my airport camera and went back to New York.
translation.ko: 난 공항 카메라를 떼서 뉴욕으로 돌아갔다

translation.en: Where's the off switch?
Oh, there it is.
Why? [sobs]
I don't wanna say good-bye to Hello.
-[electronic music playing] -I was lost.
There was no point continuing with the film. [man] ♪ Life's not always Miami ♪
translation.ko: 이 다큐를 계속 찍을 이유가 없었다

translation.en: Ah, turn off the camera!
-The documentary's off! -[man] ♪ Life's not always Miami ♪
-[cell phone chimes] -...everything changed.
Hey, yo!
Take off your wrap gifts, guys.
The documentary is not over.
I might need a wedding DJ after all.
Someone posted on Karen Sorrento's Facebook page.
translation.ko: 누가 캐런 소렌토 페이스북에 이런 거 올렸어요

translation.en: [cameraman] But that's a straight man,
translation.ko: "프랜 도드 너=섹시, 만남 콜?" 그건 이성애자 남자잖아 캐런은 네가 여자인 척...

translation.en: and Karen is you pretending to be--
translation.ko: 그건 이성애자 남자잖아 캐런은 네가 여자인 척...

translation.en: I just need a win, Scott.
And I said take your fleece off!
Let's go, boys!
Come on! Whoo!
[Fran] That's amazing.
-I love sour cream. -[laughing] Oh, who doesn't?
[Fran] Instead of a tip, I just wrote, "Here's a tip, try the cheese."
translation.ko: 아닌 사람도 있어요? 팁 대신 치즈 먹어보란 팁만 써주고 왔죠

translation.en: -She's probably mad. -Oh!
-This is mad fun. -[laughs] Yeah.
But I gotta come clean... I'm not a beautiful woman.
translation.ko: 솔직히 말하죠 난 아름다운 여자가 아니예요

translation.en: I'm a beautiful man...
a man who now feels pretty good about himself thanks to you, Fran.
translation.ko: 덕분에 자신감을 회복한 진짜 남자야, 프랜

translation.en: Another catfish.
Damn it. I knew you were too cool to be a female.
Cool like how?
Look at your profile, dude. You're a dream girl.
MAGA, ka-ra-tay, DJ Slizzard...
[stammers] ...girls in bikinis getting really hurt.
Wait, you're a Slizzard Lizard?
Are you kidding me?
He played my great-aunt's nasty 90th.
-[laughs] -And he went home with her... as a joke.
translation.ko: 끝나곤 종고모와 함께 집에 갔고, 장난삼아서

translation.en: -[laughs] -God, it just kills me that he's still locked up.
translation.ko: 아직도 감옥에 있다니 정말 마음 아파

translation.en: Especially since I know he shouldn't even be in jail.
[DJ Fingablast] I don't believe in fate,
so it was probably magic elves who brought Fran and me together that night.
translation.ko: 그러니까 그날 밤 프랜과 날 엮은 건 마법 엘프일 것이다

translation.en: Hi. Um... I am Fran Dodd.
I am founder and C-F-Bro of The Innocence Broject,
an organization that fights back in the war on men.
I am telling you, man, men are under attack.
Do you know how many times I have been stabbed with keys?
translation.ko: 제가 열쇠로 몇 번이나 찔린 줄 아세요?

translation.en: Nineteen times, just for
walking closely to a woman's face.
translation.ko: 단지 여자 얼굴에 가까이 다가갔단 이유로요

translation.en: This is where, uh, we keep a lot of, like, our--our case files here,
like, uh, Cosby. That's a big one.
Uh, Mr. Frumpus.
Richard--Richard's file?
Yeah, it's in here.
This is all proof.
How about this right here?
Where is Dick Wayne being held right now?
Okay, well, let's just take a look right here...
'cause this is where Dick Wayne is being held.
translation.ko: 딕 웨인이 수감된 곳은 바로 여기거든요

translation.en: Can you get close enough? Says it right here. Right here.
translation.ko: 카메라에 잡혀요? 바로 여길 보면 돼요

translation.en: Men's Prison.
Not People's Prison.
Mee-en's Prison. Okay?
They knew when they built this place who they were gonna lock up.
translation.ko: 누굴 가둘지 건물 지을 때부터 알았던 거예요

translation.en: It's absolutely disgusting.
Masculinity is being criminalized in this country, okay?
translation.ko: 이 나라에서 남성성은 범죄 취급을 받고 있기에

translation.en: And I want something done did about it.
Because what you're accused of
translation.ko: 선생님의 죄목은 범죄가 돼선 안 돼요

translation.en: -shouldn't be a crime. -[Richard] Exactly.
translation.ko: 선생님의 죄목은 범죄가 돼선 안 돼요 바로 그거지!

translation.en: I mean, are we even talking about? Innocent and--and guilty?
translation.ko: 이게 무죄, 유죄로 나눌 수 있는 일일까?

translation.en: Sorry, what I did was called "nature."
I mean, look at dolphins. They're huge rapists,
and ladies kiss them right on their holes over at SeaWorld.
translation.ko: 아가씨들은 시월드에서 놈들 구멍에 입 맞추잖아

translation.en: Why isn't anybody getting a tattoo of me on their ankle?
translation.ko: 난 왜 발목 문신이 될 수 없는 건데?

translation.en: Men are not the problem. Women are the problem.
Things were fine until we started letting them make their own decisions.
translation.ko: 여자들한테 결정권을 주면서 이런 사태까지 이른 거죠

translation.en: L-listen, y'all. Let me tell you
about a--about a good friend of mine
translation.ko: 해주고 싶은 얘기가 있어 내가 아끼는 친구 중 아주 잘생긴 녀석이 있는데

translation.en: who's really handsome.
translation.ko: 내가 아끼는 친구 중 아주 잘생긴 녀석이 있는데

translation.en: And he went... to LA, saved up all his money,
got a sweet-ass butt cut,
and did the ladies a favor... by going on a TV dating show.
translation.ko: 여자들을 구제하러 TV 데이트 프로에 나가줬지

translation.en: [host] Richard, how are you gonna make her feel special?
translation.ko: 리처드, 여성분께 어떤 특별 대우를 할 거죠?

translation.en: Well... we'd start off with some fabulous food,
-a little fabulous conversation... -[laughter]
...end it with a fabulous foot massage,
for an evening of total fabulosity.
And she chose Marc!
I mean, what?
They got to go to the zoo together.
Why does she even get to choose at all?
Men should be doing the choosing!
Man. I thought women should do what they want, but if they couldn't,
translation.ko: 여자에게도 선택권이 있어야 한다고 생각했는데 없었다면

translation.en: I'd still be with Hello.
God, why'd she dump me?
Because women are stupid.
They don't even know how to make decisions good.
You should see my mommy try and order at a restaurant.
translation.ko: 식당에서 우리 엄마가 주문할 때 보면 알아

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] So that night, I did.
[woman] Southern rib platter. Yum!
-No, I'll never eat all that. -No.
translation.ko: - 아니지, 다 못 먹을 거야 - 네

translation.en: But if you were gonna pick between the French dip...
-French dip. -...and the firehouse fajitas--
-French dip. -Oh, my God, what do they have?
translation.ko: - '불타는 지옥 파히타' 중 - 프렌치 딥요 어머, 저 사람들 메뉴는 뭘까?

translation.en: -[hand slams table] -God, it is dessert, Sheila! They are having dessert.
[Richard] It's dark days, brosephs.
They say, "You snooze, you lose."
Well, we snossed...
and look what we lost.
[DJ Fingablast] After talking to Fran and DJ Sliz, I read the news.
translation.ko: 프랜과 디제이 슬리즈와 얘길 나눈 후 난 기사를 봤다

translation.en: And it was news to me.
There really is a war going on.
translation.ko: 내겐 놀랄 노자였다 정말로 지금은 전시였던 거다

translation.en: I mean, who's next, the majestic anteater?
I also learned
translation.ko: 또한 우리나라 기반 시설이 엉망이란 것도 배웠다

translation.en: our infrastructure is a mess, yo!
translation.ko: 또한 우리나라 기반 시설이 엉망이란 것도 배웠다 "미국의 다리 5만 개 이상 구조 결함 존재"

translation.en: [Richard] Here we are. Now it's "Person of the Year."
translation.ko: "미국의 다리 5만 개 이상 구조 결함 존재" '올해의 인물'만 해도 그래

translation.en: They hijacked the Ocean's franchise.
Now there's a female Colonel Sanders? What's next, female chickens?
translation.ko: 여자 KFC 사장도 나오겠네 여자 치킨도 생기려나?

translation.en: I don't even get it, y'all.
But if we don't take a stand now...
-we're herstory. -[Fran] Ugh.
They're gonna shestroy everything.
[Richard] I ain't down with that world.
I have an appointment for a penis removal, -here in the year... -[musical sting]
translation.ko: 고추 제거술 예약 있어요 몇 년도에 있느냐면

translation.en: -...this year! [distorted echo] This year, this year, this year, this year, this year...
[DJ Fingablast] We have to fight back,
or pretty soon, every clip package will look like this.
translation.ko: 조만간 모든 짤막 영상이 이런 꼴이 될 것이다

translation.en: A great man rots in jail right now because Lady Justice
translation.ko: 위대한 남자는 지금 감옥에서 썩고 있다, '정의의 여신'이

translation.en: is living up to her name.
That coldhearted skank is just ice.
translation.ko: 그 냉혈한 아줌마는 얼음 그 자체다

translation.en: Meanwhile, what are DJ Slizzard's supposed victims doing?
translation.ko: "증거 B: 두더지 여인" 한편 디제이 슬리저드의 소위 희생자들은 뭘 하고 있을까?

translation.en: Cyndee Pokorny continues to profit from her tragedy.
translation.ko: 신디 포코니는 자신의 비극을 이용해 계속 돈을 벌고 있다

translation.en: She recently sang the national anthem at an NFL preseason game
translation.ko: 최근엔 NFL 프리시즌 경기서 국가를 불렀다

translation.en: between the Atlanta Vaccinators and the Chicago Interracial Marriages.
translation.ko: 애틀랜타 백시네이터와 시카고 인터레이셜 매리지의 경기였다

translation.en: ♪ And the home ♪
[DJ Fingablast] And as for Donna Maria?
She used wordplay to become a mole sauce
translation.ko: 말장난한 몰레 소스로 몰래 부자가 됐다

translation.en: mole-ionnaire and...
translation.ko: "도나 마리아 숙모의 두더지 여인 몰레 소스"

translation.en: a judge on Shark Tank Español.
[in Spanish] Marco Americano here is crazy.
What you've just described is a horse.
I'm out.
[DJ Fingablast] And Gretchen Chalker is the real cult leader.
translation.ko: 그레첸 초커는 진짜 사이비 교주가 돼서

translation.en: She's now running her own church inside a women's prison!
translation.ko: 지금은 여성 교도소에서 자신의 교회를 운영 중이다

translation.en: What?
Now they're keeping us out of the prisons we built?
translation.ko: 우리가 지은 감옥인데 우리는 못 들어간다고?

translation.en: And in the future,
female doctors will remove the penises with saws.
-Yes! That's right! -[cheers and applause]
[DJ Fingablast] Then there's Kimmy Schmidt.
[DJ Fingablast] The woman who put Tabby Bobatti in intensive care...
translation.ko: 어떻게 그놈의 여친이 될 수 있어요? 태비 보바티를 중환자실로 보낸 그 여자는

translation.en: ended up intensively caring about the Reverend.
-That's good writing. -[Kimmy grunting]
[DJ Fingablast] No wonder she was so mad at Tabby.
Kimmy is married to DJ Slizzard.
And she never gave up on bae.
translation.ko: 그리고 자기 남편을 끝까지 보내지 않았다 "리처드, 킴벌리 웨인 게리 웨인"

translation.en: [Kimmy] I'll never divorce you, Dick! Not even when pigs fly!
translation.ko: "교도소 통화 녹음 내용" 절대 이혼은 안 돼 돼지가 날아다녀도

translation.en: But that would be cute! Birds would be like, "Whaaaaat?!"
I'm never divorcing you!
[DJ Fingablast] Maybe this documentary isn't about finding a DJ for my wedding.
translation.ko: 이 다큐는 내 결혼식 디제이를 찾는 내용이 아닐지 모른다

translation.en: It's just about the best DJ of all:
love.
[Richard] Have yo-o-o-ou...
spoken to Kimmy?
Oh, for the documentary?
Shoot, that's a good idea. [Richard] No, don't ever
translation.ko: - 와, 좋은 생각인데요 - 아니, 절대로 얘기하지 마

translation.en: speak to her. I mean, because...
translation.ko: - 와, 좋은 생각인데요 - 아니, 절대로 얘기하지 마 왜냐면

translation.en: we value...
we value our privacy.
That's why I didn't say anything about it. You know? Even though
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 아무 말도 안 했던 거야

translation.en: our marriage would obviously humanize me, audience-wise.
translation.ko: 결혼한 걸 어필하면 시청자에겐 내가 더 인간적으로 보이겠지만

translation.en: Wow. Kimmy stood by you, man. [chuckles]
#NotAllWomen.
[Richard] So I guess...
...if a good woman like Kimmy
is on my side--and she is, but again, don't ask her--
translation.ko: 키미같이 좋은 여자가 내 편이라면 키미는 좋은 여자지만 절대로 말 섞진 마

translation.en: then maybe the whole word can get on board
translation.ko: 그렇다면 전 세계가 동의할 수 있겠지

translation.en: with my fabulosity.
You gotta finish this movie, Finga.
Finish it up. Hey, win a Peabody, like Entourage.
Then who knows, man? Who knows?
Maybe my case gets reopened,
and maybe I finally get reunited
with my little pasty-faced, ketchup-headed...
translation.ko: 케첩 머리를 한 우리 둥이 둥이

translation.en: ...sweetie pateetie.
Kimmy. That's who I'm talking about. You know.
[DJ Fingablast] I did my part. You just watched it.
translation.ko: 난 내 역할을 했고 여러분은 시청만 했다

translation.en: Still are.
So does Slizzard's story end here?
That's up to the people who believe in him.
translation.ko: 그건 그 사람을 믿는 사람들에게 달렸다

translation.en: People like Fran Dodd;
Fran's mom, who supports him no matter what;
translation.ko: 프랜의 엄마 아들 일이라면 뭐든 예스니까

translation.en: Fran's buddy Frisco, who you didn't meet but is cool;
translation.ko: 프랜의 친구 프리스코 출연은 안 했지만 쿨하다

translation.en: this guy we met who would literally do anything;
translation.ko: 그리고 출연했던 이 남자는 연기봇인 줄

translation.en: and, of course, -Kimmy Schmidt... -Well--
translation.ko: 그리고 키미 슈미트를 빼놓을 수 없다

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] ...TabbyBobatti; this lady;
translation.ko: - 그게... - 태비 보바티 - 이 여자, 저 남자 - 뭐에 쓴다고?

translation.en: -that dude... -What is this for?
translation.ko: - 이 여자, 저 남자 - 뭐에 쓴다고?

translation.en: [DJ Fingablast] Karen Sorrento; David Caruso;
Damar Varnish; DJ Traphouse;
DJ Trump;
and the most important person...
you, America.
Dude, they won't be able to see themselves.
We talked about this.
[DJ Fingablast] Put this part in slow motion!
So that's what that job was. [gasps]
Fooping shit!
